name: Hotel Rafain Centro
address: Rua Marechal Deodoro 984 Centro, Foz do Iguaçu 85851-030
description: Offering an outdoor pool and barbecue, Hotel Rafain Centro is located in Foz do Iguaçu in the Parana Region, 13 km from Birds Park. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and private parking is available on site. Hotel Rafain Centro offers elegant rooms that contain a cable TV and a minibar. They are stylishly decorated and offer a private bathroom with a hairdryer and other amenities. The informative staff from the travel desk is able to assist with tours to Parque Nacional do Iguaçu, where guests can visit the spectacular waterfalls or take part in rafting and ecological tours. Every morning a buffet breakfast is served, which offers a variety of fresh fruits, breads and sweets. The hotel restaurant also offers mouth-watering local and international dishes for guests to indulge in. Guests can remain active and utilise the fitness room or entertain with friends in the pool area.

name: Mabu Thermas Grand Resort
address: Av Das Cataratas 3175, Foz do Iguaçu 85853-000
description: Located above Guarani Aquifer, one of the world's largest underground water reservoirs, Mabu Thermas Grand Resort includes free breakfast and free WiFi. It features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a bar. Featuring a garden, the 5-star resort has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and organising tours for guests. Mabu Therma’s comfortable rooms are all equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen cable TV, a minibar and a desk. The private bathrooms include a shower and a hairdryer. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Grand Resort Mabu Thermas also features outdoor pools, a swim-up bar, hot tubs, sauna, sun terrace, children's water park and other attractions and recreational activities. A spa, a restaurant and a bar with high quality cuisine are available for guests. The Three Borders Landmark is 4 km away and the entrance of Iguaçu National Park is within 9 km. The nearest airport is Foz do Iguacu/Cataratas International, 8 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: San Juan Eco Hotel
address: Rodovia Das Cataratas Km 6, Foz do Iguaçu
description: The architecture of Eco Cataratas Resort was inspired by the Tupi and Guarani First Nations Culture, bringing a new lodging option to Foz do Iguaçu. When staying with us, enjoy comfort and fun. Our hotel has children's and adults' recreation, regional and international cuisine, spa, hot and wet sauna, gym, coworking space, gift shop, car rental and 3 swimming pools, one of which has an infinity edge with a length of 30m. Our breakfast offers the most diverse delights from the triple border and with international inspiration brought by the chef. The tourist attractions, which can be hired directly at the hotel's agency, are easily accessible due to the property's privileged location, which is on Rodovia das Cataratas, in the city's tourist corridor. Welcome to Eco Cataratas Resort, your newest accommodation in Foz do Iguaçu.

name: Che Lagarto Hostel E Suites Foz Do Iguaçu
address: Av. Juscelino Kubitschek, 874, Foz do Iguaçu 85851-210
description: Offering modern facilities, CLH Suítes Foz do Iguaçu is located in Foz do Iguaçu, just 200 metres from Bosque Guarani Zoo. It provides free WiFi access, as well as a 24-hour reception. Private rooms at CLH Suítes feature a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with towels. There is also a games room. CLH Suítes Foz do Iguaçu is 18km from Foz do Iguaçu International Airport, 6 km from Foz do Iguaçu Bus Station and 10 km from Itaipu Park. The famous Iguaçu Falls are 20 km away. Please note that breakfast time is every day from 7:00 am to 10:00 am.

name: San Juan Tour
address: Rua Marechal Deodoro 1349 Centro, Foz do Iguaçu
description: Set in Foz do Iguaçu in the Parana Region, 13 km from Birds Park, San Juan Tour features a year-round outdoor pool and fitness centre. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and free private parking is available on site. Room service is provided 24 hours a day. All rooms are air-conditioned and equipped with cable TV, minibar, work desk and other amenities. Bathroom is private. A bar and restaurant are also available on site, serving a specially varied buffet breakfast. At the San Juan Tour's tour desk, you can also book guided excursions to the main regional attractions. Iguaçu Waterfalls is 21 km from San Juan Tour, while Iguaçu National Park is 22 km away. The nearest airport is Foz do Iguacu/Cataratas International Airport, 11 km from San Juan Tour.

name: Pietro Angelo Hotel
address: Rua Almirante Barroso, 1864 - Centro, Foz do Iguaçu 85851-010
description: Located in the Foz do Iguacu City Centre district in Foz do Iguaçu, 13 km from Birds Park, Pietro Angelo Hotel features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom. Extras include free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guests can benefit from a rich breakfast buffet with over 50 options of items, including freshly baked cakes and breads, natural juices and pastries. The Pietro Angelo is also 25 km from Cataratas Del Iguazú Airport. Due to its central location, several lively restaurants, bars and leisure options are within walking distance from the hotel.

name: Hotel Colonial Iguaçu
address: Rod. Das Cataratas, Km 20, Foz do Iguaçu 85855-750
description: Boasting indoor and outdoor pools, Hotel Colonial Iguaçu offers accommodation in Foz do Iguaçu, only a few minutes walking from the National Park and the renowned waterfalls in Foz do Iguaçu. Free WiFi is offered in public areas and free private parking is available on site. The comfortable rooms at Hotel Colonial Iguaçu feature air conditioning and a private bathroom. Superior categories also offer cable TV. The hotel also features a playground, games room, gym and barbecuing facilities. A buffet breakfast is served each morning in the breakfast room. It includes a variety of fresh fruits, breads and cold meats, as well as a selection of hot and cold drinks.

name: Hotel Monalisa
address: Avenida das Cataratas Km 02, Foz do Iguaçu 85853-000
description: Surrounded by lush nature, hotel Monalisa is ideally located 2.5 km from the Foz do Iguaçu centre and 16 km away from Parque Nacional. It offers a swimming pool and free Wi-Fi. Monalisa Hotel provides practical rooms with air conditioning, a TV and a minibar. They are simply styled with white linens, a bed side table and tiled floors. Each room also contains a private bathroom. Every morning a buffet breakfast is served, which offers a variety of fresh fruits, breads and cold meats. An outdoor barbecue area is also provided, where travellers can get together and entertain. After a workout in the gym or a game of mini-soccer, guests can enjoy a drink from the coffee shop or from the bar. The nearest bus station is just 4 km away and private, on-site parking is free.

name: Suíça Hotel by Nordic
address: Av. Felipe Wandscheer 3580, Foz do Iguaçu
description: Located in Foz do Iguaçu, the Suíça Hotel by Nordic offers easy access to Iguaçu Falls and the city centre. On-site recreation includes swimming, hiking,table tennis,billiards and children's playground. Free WiFi is available. The Suíça offers comfortable rooms, equipped with air conditioning and a cable TV. All rooms include a private balcony or terrace. Guests can enjoy a swim in the Suiça‘s outdoor pool or a workout in the fitness center. A 2 km nature trail is on-site, perfect for jogging or walking. The Suíça Hotel by Nordic restaurants serve a variety of international and Brazilian cuisine. The disco and bar offer a variety of delicious cocktails. The resort is located just 12 km from the Foz do Iguaçu airport, and is a short drive from the stunning Iguaçu Falls.

address: Rua Irlan Kalichevski, 231, Foz do Iguaçu 85853-190
description: No description found

name: Pousada Sonho Meu Foz
address: Rua Men De Sa 267, Foz do Iguaçu
description: No description found

name: Hotel Damen
address: Av Costa e Silva, 2392, Foz do Iguaçu 85858-010
description: Hotel Damen offers a swimming pool and sun terrace surrounded by tropical trees only 3 km from Foz do Iguaçu centre and 5 km from the Paraguayan boarder. Wi-Fi and parking are free. All rooms at Hotel Damen are air-conditioned. They feature a TV, minibar and private bathroom with a hot shower. The hotel also has a business centre with computers, tour desk and laundry facilities. A daily breakfast buffet is served in the breakfast room with breads, cold cuts, and a selection of hot and cold beverages and fruits. Iguassu Falls National Park is located 17 km from the hotel. The property is 14 km from Foz do Iguaçu Airport.

description: No description found

name: Foz Budget Hotel
address: 31 Rua Antônio Salazar, Foz do Iguaçu 85863-600
description: Set in Foz do Iguaçu, 15 km from Iguazu Casino, Foz Budget Hotel offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 16 km from Itaipu. The units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. At Foz Budget Hotel all rooms come with bed linen and towels. An à la carte breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Speaking English, Spanish and Portuguese at the reception, staff are always at hand to help. Iguazu Falls is 32 km from Foz Budget Hotel, while Iguaçu National Park is 33 km away. The nearest airport is Foz do Iguacu/Cataratas International Airport, 18 km from the hotel.

name: Pousada Natureza Foz
address: Rua Maximino Tosi 253, Foz do Iguaçu 85864-030
description: With free Wi-Fi and free parking, this guest house is set in a pleasant green area, in Foz do Iguaçu centre. It offers air-conditioned rooms and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation at Pousada Natureza Foz features practical tile floors and colourful bedding. It includes TV and private bathroom. Guests enjoy a daily buffet breakfast with a variety of tropical fruits, breads and Brazilian specialities, such as corn cake with anise seeds. Pousada Natureza Foz is located 2 blocks from Juscelino Kubitschek Avenue and 5 km from the bus station. Foz do Iguaçu National Park is 28 km away.

name: Hotel Blue Star II
address: Rua Minas Gerais, 387, Foz do Iguaçu 85852-030
description: Comfortable rooms are offered just 600 metres from Cataratas JL Shopping Mall. Downtown Foz do Iguaçu is only 1 km from Blue Star II. Shuttles to Foz do Iguaçu Airport, 13 km away, are available. Wi-Fi is free in all areas. Hotel Blue Star II has air-conditioned rooms with TV, cable channels and private bathrooms with showers. There are laundry services. Guests can enjoy a full buffet breakfast with fresh fruits, breads, cheese and world-famous Brazilian coffee. Tancredo Neves Bridge is 7 km away. Private parking is free and there is 24-hour front desk assistance.

name: Iguassu Flats Hotel
address: Rua Barão de Rio Branco, 409, Foz do Iguaçu 85851-310
description: Located in Foz do Iguaçu, Iguassu Flats offers an outdoor pool. This accommodation features free WiFi. The property is 13 km from Birds Park and 21.1 km from Iguaçu Waterfalls. Guests can book a bedroom, equipped with conditioning and private bathrooms, or apartments, that offer a fully equipped kitchenette. The property offers free parking. If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out Iguaçu National Park (21.5 km). Foz do Iguacu/Cataratas International Airport is located 12 km away.

name: Hotel Fenice
address: R. Espanha 368, Foz do Iguaçu 85865-110
description: Offering an outdoor pool, Hotel Fenice is located in Foz do Iguaçu, approximately 1.5 km from the Paraguayan border and 8 km from Itaipu Hydroelectric Power Plant. Free WiFi access is available throughout the property. All flats have a practical design and come with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning, a minibar and a work desk, as well as private bathrooms with a shower. At Hotel Fenice you will find a garden, a snack bar, luggage storage and a kiosk with barbecue facilities. In addition, the property also offers free private parking for cars, vans and buses. During your stay, you can also enjoy the daily buffet breakfast included in the rate. Iguaçu National Park and Parque das Aves are approximately 19 km from this property, Foz do Iguaçu International Airport is approximately 17 km, while Foz do Iguaçu International Bus Station is approximately 3 km.

name: Hotel Biton
address: Av. Fortaleza, 120, Foz do Iguaçu 85868-110
description: Located in Foz do Iguaçu, 12 km from Itaipu, Hotel Biton provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking and a shared lounge. This 3-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 15 km from Iguazu Casino. At the hotel, each room includes a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Guest rooms at Hotel Biton include air conditioning and a wardrobe. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet or an American breakfast. Iguazu Falls is 33 km from Hotel Biton, while Iguaçu National Park is 34 km away. The nearest airport is Foz do Iguacu/Cataratas International Airport, 18 km from the hotel.

Rooms have private patios. 32-inch flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided on request. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Additional amenities at this farm stay include complimentary wireless Internet access, shopping on site, and a television in a common area. This farm stay is 5.5 mi (8.8 km) from Catuai Palladium Shopping Center and 7.9 mi (12.7 km) from Parque Nacional do Iguacu. name: My Mabu
address: 492 Rua Carlos Hugo Urnau, Foz do Iguaçu 85853-734
description: Set in Foz do Iguaçu, 7.7 km from Iguazu Casino, MY MABU offers accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking and a tennis court. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a water park. The accommodation features entertainment staff and a concierge service. At the hotel all rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchenette, a dining area and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a shower and a hairdryer. At MY MABU the rooms come with bed linen and towels. You can play billiards and table tennis at the 5-star hotel. Itaipu is 23 km from the accommodation, while Iguazu Falls is 25 km from the property. The nearest airport is Foz do Iguacu/Cataratas International Airport, 11 km from MY MABU.

name: Falls Galli Hotel
address: Avenida Costa E Silva, 1602, Foz do Iguaçu 85863-000
description: The 4-star Falls Galli Hotel provides a calm atmosphere and leisure options that include a playground, games room and outdoor swimming pools. It is 17 km from Iguazu Falls National Park. A daily breakfast is included in the room price. The hotel features a restaurant, a coffee shop and a poolside bar. A store and a travel agency are also found on site. In addition, there is a taxi stop just outside the hotel. The 4-star Falls Galli Hotel lies about 500 meters from the International Bus Station and 1 km from a shopping mall. Downtown Foz do Iguaçu is 1,2 km away, and Itaipu Power Plant is 19 km away.

name: Miau Maison Internacional Alojamento Urbano
address: 344 Avenida Dos Imigrantes, Foz do Iguaçu 85853-060
description: Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a pool with a view, pool view and a balcony, MIAU Maison Internacional Alojamento Urbano is situated in Foz do Iguaçu. Featuring a shared kitchen, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. There is free private parking and the property provides paid airport shuttle service. With free WiFi, this guest house features a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave. This guest house also includes a patio that doubles up as an outdoor dining area. The guest house offers bed linen, towels and laundry service. Guests at the guest house will be able to enjoy activities in and around Foz do Iguaçu, like hiking. Barbecue facilities are provided at the guest house, and guests can also relax in the garden or go on a picnic in the picnic area. Iguazu Casino is 7.8 km from MIAU Maison Internacional Alojamento Urbano, while Itaipu is 21 km from the property. The nearest airport is Foz do Iguacu/Cataratas International Airport, 11 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel das Cataratas, A Belmond Hotel, Iguassu Falls
address: Rodovia Br 469 Km 32, Foz do Iguaçu 85855-750
description: Facing the spectacular Iguaçu Falls inside Iguaçu National Park, the 5-star Hotel das Cataratas, A Belmond Hotel, Iguassu Falls allows guests to enjoy a cocktail by the swimming pool or play a game of tennis on the provided court, and also provides free WiFi Hotel das Cataratas, A Belmond Hotel, Iguassu Falls offers traditional Portuguese styled rooms with a flat screen TV, dark wood furniture and warm natural tones. Some rooms provide a balcony and seating area. The Ipê Grill Restaurant provides view of the pool and the Itaipu Restaurant provide view of the falls. They serve a selection of international and local Brazilian cuisine. In the evening live music can be enjoyed in the downstairs bar. The Iguaçu Falls lie between the Brazilian state of Paraná and Argentina. The Brazilian side offers postcard panoramic views, while the Argentinian side provides varied, up-close views.

name: JL Hotel by Bourbon
address: Av Costa East Silva 154, Foz do Iguaçu
description: Featuring free WiFi and a restaurant, JL Hotel by Bourbon offers rooms in Foz do Iguaçu, 14 km from Birds Park and 16 km from Iguaçu Waterfalls. The property is 14 km from Iguaçu National Park and 26 km away from Garganta del Diablo. The property features an outdoor pool and is situated 1 km from Country Club. Mensual Museum is 3.9 km from JL Hotel by Bourbon. Foz do Iguacu/Cataratas International Airport is 11 km away. The pet's daily rate is R$ 230.00 + 5% ISS.

name: Bourbon Cataratas do Iguaçu Thermas Eco Resort
address: Rodovia Das Cataratas, Km 2,5, Foz do Iguaçu 85863-000
description: Ideally located on the borders of Brazil, Argentina and Paraguay, this completely non-smoking 5-star resort hotel offers modern accommodation just 22 km from the Iguassú Falls. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The tastefully decorated rooms may feature pool or garden views. They provide cable TV and private bathrooms with a shower. Bourbon Cataratas is surrounded by lush, tropical gardens. It offers a variety of activities that can be enjoyed by all, including 2 swimming pools, a tennis court, and Kids Club. For relaxation there is a day-spa with massage services and sauna at an extra charge. The Bourbon Cataratas offers a variety of restaurants and bars serving local and international cuisines. Alternatively, downtown Foz do Iguassú is 3 km from the hotel, where numerous restaurants and shops can be found.

name: Wish Foz do Iguaçu
address: Av.Das Cataratas, 6845, Foz do Iguaçu 85853-000
description: Wish Foz do Iguaçu offers 5-star accommodation in Foz do Iguaçu. The luxury hotel owns the 2016 Best Resort Award, as well as the 2017 and 2018 Best Resort for Families in South America. It features free WiFi, international restaurants and outdoor pools. Wish Foz do Iguaçu offers sophisticated rooms with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a minibar. They are elegantly styled with classic wooden furniture and soft décor. Some rooms offer floor-to-ceiling windows and garden views. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. A guide desk is able to assist guests with various Iguaçu Falls tour options. Guests can also hike through the National Park or relax in the hotel hot tub. They can also enjoy a workout in the fitness centre and can unwind in the sauna. Children can play in the one of the biggest Kids' Clubs in Brazil. The property offers buffet breakfast with a variety of fresh fruits, breads and sweets, as well as sample some of the many local and international specialties in one of the on-site restaurants. Forneria di Como offers Italian dishes, while Frontera Sur offers Argentinian delicacies. The hotel is situated close to the entrance and to the Argentinian side of Iguaçu Park. It is located between the city centre and Foz do Iguaçu Airport, which is a 15-minute drive away.

name: Nadai Confort Hotel e Spa
address: Av. República Argentina, 1332, Foz do Iguaçu 85851-200
description: Boasting an outdoor pool, spa and a gym, Nadai Confort Hotel offers pet-friendly accommodation in Foz do Iguaçu. Free WiFi is offered and is available on site. Foz do Iguaçu International Airport is 15 km away. The Nadai Confort Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV, with dozens of cable channels a minibar, telephone and en suite bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities. The flooring is fitted with marble. Breakfast is served each morning and includes a variety of fresh fruits, breads and cold meats. Regional specialties, as well as a selection of drinks are available in the hotel’s restaurant or via 24-hour room service. Guests can enjoy drinks at the bar by the swimming pool. The hotel also provides a children's playground. Daily parking costs R$20. The daily rate for pets is R$120. The amounts will be charged at the property.

name: Luz Hotel by Castelo Itaipava
address: Avenida Gustavo Dobrandino Da Silva 145, Foz do Iguaçu 85863-370
description: The 3-star Luz Hotel by Castelo Itaipava welcomes you in Foz do Iguaçu offering free WiFi and rooms equipped with air conditioning, telephone, cable TV and minibar. During your stay, your whole family can spend a joyful time in the swimming pool next to the leisure area. A rich breakfast buffet awaits you every morning in the hotel restaurant. The Luz Hotel by Castelo Itaipava is located near the Foz do Iguaçu International Bus Station, about 3 km from downtown and 5 km from the bridge that will take you to Paraguay.

name: Wyndham Foz do Iguacu
address: Rua Rui Barbosa, 394, Foz do Iguaçu 85851-170
description: Modern accommodation with an outdoor pool is offered at Wyndham Golden Foz Suítes. The Hotel is situated in Foz do Iguaçu´s city centre and boasts dry and steam sauna facilities, plus a fitness centre. The air-conditioned rooms boast a bright décor, featuring a seating area, cable TV and minibar. Some rooms offer a kitchenette. Room service is available from 9 am to 10 pm. Wyndham Golden Foz Suítes hosts a cafe bistrot and a pool bar. At the restaurant, buffet breakfast is served daily, with seasonal fruits, fresh juices, breads and cakes. Cataratas Airport is 15 km away from the hotel. Shopping can be done in JL Shopping Mall, which is located 2 km away. Iguaçu National Park is 27 km away and Ciudad del Este is 5 km from the property.

name: Interludium Iguassu Hotel by Atlantica
address: Rua Da Cosmoetica, 1761, Foz do Iguaçu 85853-755
description: Located in a quiet area and close to a large green area in Foz do Iguaçu, 8 km from Birds Park, Interludium Iguassu Hotel by Atlantica features a restaurant, bar and free WiFi throughout the property. Free private parking is available on site. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV. Certain units include a seating area for your convenience. Bathrooms are private and offer free toiletries and a hairdryer. You will find a 24-hour front desk and gift shop at the property. Iguaçu Waterfalls is 16 km from Interludium Iguassu Hotel by Atlantica, while Iguaçu National Park is 17 km away. The nearest airport is Foz do Iguacu/Cataratas International Airport, 6 km from the property.

name: Foz Plaza Hotel
address: Rua Marechal Deodoro 1819 - Centro, Foz do Iguaçu 85851-030
description: Foz Plaza is a modern hotel in the centre of Foz do Iguaçu. WiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge.
